DOC.brief_title: Residence Time Evaluation Marketed OTC Ophthalmic Products
DOC.criteria: Informed consent HIPAA read , sign date conducting procedure . Adult volunteer diagnose mild moderate dry eye . Criteria diagnosis must include 2 3 follow characteristic : composite symptom score > = 5 modified Schein questionnaire ; NaFl TFBUT < = 7 second either eye ; NaFl corneal stain sum score > = 3 ( use 015 point grade system ) . Able willing follow study instruction . 4 ) Bestcorrected V.A . 0.6 logMAR good OU . History evidence ocular intraocular surgery either eye w/i past 6 month . History evidence serious ocular trauma either eye w/i past 6 month . History intolerance hypersensitivity component study medication . History evidence epithelial herpes simplex keratitis , vaccinia , active recent varicella viral disease cornea and/or conjunctiva and/or eyelid , mycobacterial infection eye , and/or fungal disease eye . Use concomitant topical ocular medication study period . Patients use systemic medication may contribute dry eye may enrol unless stable dose regimen minimum 30 day prior Visit 1 , dose regimen must remain stable throughout study period . Ocular condition conjunctival infection , iritis , ocular condition may preclude safe admininstration test article . Individuals unwilling d/c contact lens wear study period . CL wear must d/c least one week prior Visit 1 . Participation investigational drug device study w/i 30 day enter study . Additionally , subject may declare ineligible valid medical reason .
